object.title: OBJECT:
object.content: This website aims to provide information about the Buddhist temple, its activities, events, teachings, and resources for interested people.

intellectualProperty.title: INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY:
intellectualProperty.content: All content on this website, including texts, images, logos, videos, or any other material, is owned by the Buddhist temple or its respective authors and is protected by intellectual and industrial property rights.

responsibility.title: RESPONSIBILITY:
responsibility.content: The holder is not responsible for misuse of the site's content or any damages resulting from its use. We reserve the right to modify the site's content without prior notice.

externalLinks.title: EXTERNAL LINKS:
externalLinks.content: This site may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the content or privacy policies of those sites.

applicableLaw.title: APPLICABLE LAW:
applicableLaw.content: The relationship between the user and the site holder shall be governed by the current Spanish legislation.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy policy
privacyPolicy.responsible: Responsible: Jard√≠n del Despertar Buddhist Temple
privacyPolicy.purpose: Purpose: To manage communications, activities, and services offered by the temple through the website.
privacyPolicy.legalBasis: Legal basis: User consent and compliance with legal obligations.
privacyPolicy.recipients: Recipients: Data will not be transferred to third parties, except under legal obligation.
privacyPolicy.rights: Rights: To access, rectify, and delete data, as well as other rights detailed in the additional information.
privacyPolicy.additionalInfo: Additional information: You can consult the detailed information about Data Protection by requesting it via email to our responsible person.
privacyPolicy.guarantee: The Buddhist temple guarantees the confidentiality of personal data and compliance with data protection regulations according to Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR) and Organic Law 3/2018 (LOPDGDD).

cookiesPolicy.title: Cookies policy
cookiesPolicy.introduction: This website uses own and third-party cookies for technical and statistical purposes. A cookie is a small file downloaded to your browser when accessing certain web pages.
cookiesPolicy.technicalCookies: Technical cookies: necessary for the site‚Äôs operation.
cookiesPolicy.analyticalCookies: Analytical cookies: used to obtain usage statistics through tools like Google Analytics.
cookiesPolicy.managementContent: You can allow, block, or delete the cookies installed on your device by configuring your browser options.
cookiesPolicy.acceptance: By continuing to browse this website, you accept the use of cookies under the conditions established in this Policy.

paymentOptions.title: Payment Options
paymentOptions.account_holder: Account holder: Asociaci√≥n Budista Templo del Dharma
paymentOptions.instructions: Once payment is made, upload the receipt in the form to validate your membership.
paymentOptions.upload_description: Submit an image or PDF of your payment receipt. The team will manually validate your request and activate your membership.

our_center.title: Our center
our_center.paragraph1: Founded in September 2007 inspired by the nun Ani Sherab Wangmo, it belongs to the Dagpo Shangpa Kagy√º lineage, an unbroken oral transmission of over a thousand years. Its opening was blessed by Mingyur Rinpoche and it is currently under the spiritual direction of Ani Sherab.
our_center.paragraph2: The temple offers teachings, prayers and practices with the aim of cultivating happiness, peace, compassion and spiritual awakening. Retreats are open to people of all levels.

guided_meditation.title: Guided Meditation
guided_meditation.paragraph1: Connect with yourself through guided meditation sessions, designed to calm the mind and cultivate presence.
guided_meditation.paragraph2: Our classes are accessible to all levels and integrate traditional practices adapted to modern life.

individual_attention.title: Individual Attention
individual_attention.paragraph1: We offer personalized accompaniment with instructors trained in mindful listening and Buddhist practice.
individual_attention.paragraph2: These sessions allow you to delve into personal challenges with clarity, compassion and direction.

tibetan_buddhism_intro.title: Introduction to Tibetan Buddhism
tibetan_buddhism_intro.paragraph1: A basic course to learn the fundamental teachings of Buddhism and how to apply them in daily life.
tibetan_buddhism_intro.paragraph2: Includes talks, guided reading and spaces for shared reflection.

online_classes.title: Online Classes
online_classes.paragraph1: Participate from anywhere in our live or recorded sessions.
online_classes.paragraph2: We use accessible platforms and offer complementary resources to accompany your learning at your own pace.

tibetan_tarot.title: Tibetan Tarot
tibetan_tarot.paragraph1: A self-knowledge tool based on symbols and archetypes from Tibetan Buddhism.
tibetan_tarot.paragraph2: Tibetan tarot does not predict the future, but helps understand the present from a spiritual perspective, revealing mental and emotional patterns that influence your daily life.
tibetan_tarot.paragraph3: We offer individual sessions where, through conscious reading, a space for reflection and internal guidance is opened.

shop.title: Our Shop
shop.message2: Our shop is under construction and will soon blossom with products designed to accompany you on your journey.
shop.message3: Thank you for your patience and support üôè

events.title: Events

staticEvent.title: Fixed events
staticEvent.description: We invite you to connect with yourself and find inner peace from the comfort of your home. Every Thursday we offer guided online meditation sessions, designed to reduce stress, calm the mind and cultivate mindfulness. It doesn't matter if you're a beginner or already experienced: our classes are open to everyone.
